migrations.description: Migration for v20.0.0-beta.7
migrations.name: move-use-daemon-process

migrations.description: Set `useLegacyCache` to true for migrating workspaces
migrations.name: use-legacy-cache

migrations.description: Update TypeScript ESLint packages to v8.13.0 if they are already on v8
migrations.name: update-typescript-eslint-v8.13.0

migrations.description: Update workspace to use Storybook v8
migrations.name: update-19-6-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: replace getJestProjects with getJestProjectsAsync
migrations.name: replace-getJestProjects-with-getJestProjectsAsync

migrations.description: Update ciWebServerCommand to use static serve for the application.
migrations.name: update-19-6-0-update-ci-webserver-for-vite

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~18.1.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-18-1-0

migrations.description: Ensure Module Federation DTS is turned off by default.
migrations.name: update-19-6-0

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~18.2.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-18-2-0

migrations.description: Ensure Target Defaults are set correctly for Module Federation.
migrations.name: update-19-6-1-ensure-module-federation-target-defaults

migrations.description: Update the ModuleFederationConfig import use @nx/module-federation.
migrations.name: update-20-2-0-update-module-federation-config-import

migrations.description: Update the withModuleFederation import use @nx/module-federation/angular.
migrations.name: update-20-2-0-update-with-module-federation-import

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~19.0.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-19-0-0

migrations.description: Add the '@angular/localize/init' polyfill to the 'polyfills' option of targets using esbuild-based executors.
migrations.name: add-localize-polyfill-to-targets

migrations.description: Update '@angular/ssr' import paths to use the new '/node' entry point when 'CommonEngine' is detected.
migrations.name: update-angular-ssr-imports-to-use-node-entry-point

migrations.description: Disable the Angular ESLint prefer-standalone rule if not set.
migrations.name: disable-angular-eslint-prefer-standalone

migrations.description: Remove Angular ESLint rules that were removed in v19.0.0.
migrations.name: remove-angular-eslint-rules

migrations.description: Remove the deprecated 'tailwindConfig' option from ng-packagr executors. Tailwind CSS configurations located at the project or workspace root will be picked up automatically.
migrations.name: remove-tailwind-config-from-ng-packagr-executors

migrations.description: Updates non-standalone Directives, Component and Pipes to 'standalone:false' and removes 'standalone:true' from those who are standalone
migrations.name: explicit-standalone-flag

migrations.description: Updates ExperimentalPendingTasks to PendingTasks
migrations.name: pending-tasks

migrations.description: Replaces `APP_INITIALIZER`, `ENVIRONMENT_INITIALIZER` & `PLATFORM_INITIALIZER` respectively with `provideAppInitializer`, `provideEnvironmentInitializer` & `providePlatformInitializer`.
migrations.name: provide-initializer

migrations.description: Updates Angular Material to v19
migrations.name: migration-v19

migrations.description: Updates the Angular CDK to v19
migrations.name: migration-v19

migrations.description: Make the state of all existing SignalStores unprotected
migrations.name: 18_0_0-rc_3-protected-state

migrations.description: Replace StateSignal usages with WritableStateSource
migrations.name: 18_0_0-rc_3-writablestatesource

migrations.description: As of NgRx v18, the `tapResponse` import has been removed from `@ngrx/component-store` in favor of the `@ngrx/operators` package.
migrations.name: ngrx-component-store-migration-18-beta
